item.title: By: Rainer
item.dc:creator: Rainer
item.description: Congratulations! A great conference. I hope there will be a live cam ;-)
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: George Dafermos
item.dc:creator: George Dafermos
item.description:
many kudos!
and yes, i agree it's a shame that ETCON is not reimbursing speakers' travel expenses, however, it seems your finances are swiftly improving to afford taking a trip to the states. in any case, i'm glad you'll be there to speak about wireless revolutions!
item.content:encoded:
many kudos!

and yes, i agree it’s a shame that ETCON is not reimbursing speakers’ travel expenses, however, it seems your finances are swiftly improving to afford taking a trip to the states. in any case, i’m glad you’ll be there to speak about wireless revolutions!
